channel.title: Need help making server
channel.description:
Ok so,
I was making a server following stormcutter`s guide until i reached portforwarding. At that she said "click star then run then put ipconfig". And i did it but all it did was flash. Can anybody help me and tell me whats going on? I wanna make a server and atleast have it half mine. :(

item.title: Need help making server
item.dc:creator: @help_wit_server help wit server
item.description:
@help_wit_server wrote:

rag3r could u log onto ur hotmail and rawr u should to because i have the same problem and this way we can share pics and stuff 2 help better understand

Read full topic
